actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to study methods to reduce accidents on Federal-aid highways caused by drivers falling asleep while operating certain commercial motor vehicles.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to conduct and report to the Congress on a study of methods to reduce accidents on Federal-aid highways caused by drivers falling asleep while operating a commercial motor vehicle used to transport freight.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to study methods to reduce accidents on Federal-aid highways caused by drivers falling asleep while operating certain commercial motor vehicles.
